description:
The team at Block Boy loves all things Minecraft, that is why we have created a course that provides step by step video guides on how to brew 13 of the most useful and fun potions in Minecraft! Learn the ingredients needed, the exact process of brewing each potion and in game footage of the effects each potion has.

Lear how to brew these 13 useful potions

> Fire Resistance Potion

> Regeneration Potion

> Nigh Vision Potion

> Invisibility Potion

> Healing Potion

> Harming Potion

> Poison Potion

> Slowness Potion

> Strength Potion

> Swiftness Potion

> Leaping Potion

> Underwater Breathing Potion

> Weakness Potion

With live in game action you can fully see the process of each potion PLUS the effects each has on steve and or mobs. The perfect guide for Minecraft newbies all the way to master of the greatest game ever Minecraft!

Get it today!
title: How to Brew Minecraft Potions
